result.execSummary:
The defendant Aaron G Soohoo was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).
  • Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).
  • Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and DNA surcharge are to be paid at the rate of $25 per month commencing 04-01-2017 and the 1st of each month until paid in full or serve 14 days jail as penalty for failure to pay.
To be paid inclusive of fine payment plan.
To be paid inclusive of fine payment plan or serve 8 days jail, consecutive to count 1 as penalty for failure to pay.

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes: To be paid inclusive of fine payment plan or serve 8 days jail, consecutive to count 2 as penalty for failure to pay.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aaron G Soohoo

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Aaron G Soohoo in court with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.  

State moves to amend to 3 Misdemeanors.
Defense has no objections.
Amended Information filed.

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to count 1.
Defendant enters a plea of No Contest of counts 2 & 3.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of all 3 counts.

Court orders the following:
Count 1:
Fine:  $473.50
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid at the rate of $25 per month, starting 04/01/17 and the 1st of every month until paid in full.
Alternate:  14 Days in the Waukesha County Jail.


Count 2:
Fine: $379
Continue payment plan.
Alternate:  8 Days in the Waukesha County Jail - Consecutive to count 1.


Count 3:
Fine: $379
Continue payment plan.
Alternate:  8 Days in the Waukesha County Jail - Consecutive to count 2.
